article_title: It's Time for Grown-Ups to Get Their Shots
article_text:
A new push is on to get more adults vaccinated against devastating diseases like pneumonia, shingles and whooping cough.

Public-health officials and infectious-disease experts are working with physicians, health plans and drugstore chains to better educate adults about what shots they need—and make sure they follow up. State health departments are expanding the use of registries to better document patient vaccine records, and using...

twitter.description: Adults have their own vaccination needs, but they’ve often been neglected. Now doctors are trying to correct that.
twitter.creator: @lauralandroWSJ
